fullText:
Domain Synergy

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Cleric, domain feat and the domain’s divinity feat
Benefit: When you use the Channel Divinity power of a domain for which you have the domain feat, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls with that domain’s associated at-will powers until the end of the encounter.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379, page(s) 55.
